name: Man Push Cart
summary_text: A night in the life of a former Pakistani rock star who now sells coffee from his push cart on the streets of Manhattan.

name: Humraaz
summary_text: When a businessman learns that his wife married him only for money, he hatches a plan with her ex-lover to kill her.

name: Vchera
summary_text: The 1960s was the time of Beatles and Rolling Stones, the time of sexual revolution. These events have their echo in Bulgarian English-learning school. The school order provokes a protest of the students due to the narrow-minded teachers.

name: Pan Tadeusz
summary_text: In the early 1810s, Poles, part of Russia's client state of Lithuania, think independence will come if they join forces with Napoleon when he invades Russia. This unity of purpose, in one ...                See full summary »

name: Annemin Yarasi
summary_text: Upon turning 18, Salih leaves his orphanage to embark on a journey that will uncover bitter truths of a war-ridden past.

name: Antisocial
summary_text: Five university friends gather at a house party to ring in the New Year. Unbeknownst to them, an epidemic has erupted outside, causing outbreaks around the world.

name: Amundsen
summary_text: The life and facts of Norwegian explorer Roald Amundsen, the first man to arrive on the South Pole.

name: Hawk the Slayer
summary_text: With the aid of his companions, a man seeks to defeat his evil brother who has taken a nun hostage.

name: Tarzan Finds a Son!
summary_text: Tarzan finds a boy from a crashed plane and raises him with Jane in the jungle. A search party comes looking for the plane.

name: Shelley
summary_text: Louise and Kasper want to become parents but Louise is unable to have children. She seals a pact with her Romanian maid, Elena, to bear Louise's child, but things don't turn out as they planned.

name: Mr. Wonderful
summary_text: In an attempt to end alimony payments, a working class man tries to set up his ex wife with potential husbands.

name: Any Number Can Win
summary_text: Charles (Jean Gabin), a sixtyish career criminal fresh out of jail, rejects his wife's plan for a quiet life of bourgeois respectability. He enlists a former cellmate, Francis (Alain Delon)...                See full summary »

name: The Damned
summary_text: An American tourist, a youth gang leader, and his troubled sister find themselves trapped in a top secret government facility experimenting on children.

name: The Ghost Breakers
summary_text: A radio broadcaster, his quaking manservant and an heiress investigate the mystery of a haunted castle in Cuba.

name: After the Ball
summary_text: After a young fashion designer runs afoul of her corrupt stepmother and stepsisters, she dons a disguise to help save the family business for her father.

name: The Evil Within
summary_text: The sadistic tale of a lonely, mentally handicapped boy who befriends his reflection in an antique mirror. This demonic creature orders him to go on a murderous rampage to kill the people he loves most.

name: Deadline - U.S.A.
summary_text: With his newspaper about to be sold, crusading editor Ed Hutcheson tries to complete an exposé on gangster Rienzi.

name: Buddy Games
summary_text: A group of friends reunite to play The Buddy Games, a wild assortment of absurd physical and mental challenges. In the process, they'll heal old wounds, right past wrongs and figure out the true meaning of friendship...or die trying.

name: Cast a Deadly Spell
summary_text: In a fantastical 40's where magic is used by everyone, a hard-boiled detective investigates the theft of a mystical tome.

name: Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose
summary_text: On April 12, 1961, Soviet cosmonaut Gagarin blasted off in a Vostok rocket and he orbited Earth for 108 minutes. He was the cosmonaut who was selected from over three thousand fighter pilots throughout the Soviet Union.

name: French Fried Vacation 3: Friends Forever
summary_text: Movie about friends who reunite after 20 years and a lot of things have changed.

name: Speed Zone
summary_text: Despite the police's preemptive strike, the illegal coast-to-coast car race is still on with new drivers. It's a race where fair play, red lights, stop signs, police roadblocks and traffic rules in general have no validity.

name: Boom Town
summary_text: Two buddies who rise from fly-by-night wildcatters to oil tycoons over a twenty year period both love the same woman.

name: Hot Dog... The Movie
summary_text: Harkin Banks heads to skiing championships in California. A teen runaway tags along as he parties and competes with friends and foes.

name: For Me and My Gal
summary_text: Two vaudeville performers fall in love, but find their relationship tested by the arrival of WWI.

name: Kundo: Age of the Rampant
summary_text: A period action film centered on a militia group who turn against an unjust nobility.

name: The Gruffalo's Child
summary_text: A little Gruffalo ignores her father's warnings and tiptoes out into the snow in search of the Big Bad Mouse.

name: Command Performance
summary_text: When the Russian Premier is taken hostage at a rock concert in Moscow, it's up to a drummer, an ex-biker, to save him.

name: Trucker
summary_text: A trucker, leading a life free of depth and on the way to nowhere, is forced to make a decision about her aggressive loner 11-year-old son whom she openly deserted ten years previously.

name: Ike: Countdown to D-Day
summary_text: A dramatization of the 90 days leading up to Operation Overlord, the Allied invasion of Normandy, and how General Dwight Eisenhower, against all odds, brilliantly orchestrated the most important military maneuver in modern history.

name: The Conqueror
summary_text: Mongol chief Temujin battles against Tartar armies and for the love of the Tartar princess Bortai. Temujin becomes the emperor Genghis Khan.

name: Yowis Band
summary_text: Bayu falls in love with a girl and decided to form a band to make himself more popular than the girls' boyfriend. He forms a band with his friend and they name it Yowis Ben. But the problem happens when Yowis Ben is starting to popular.

name: Boarding School
summary_text: A young boy becomes fascinated with the persona of his dead grandmother and is sent to an isolated boarding school for misfits run by a mysterious headmaster and his wife.

name: Nowhereland
summary_text: A teenage girl, whose mother is at the end of her career as a sex escort, has to find a way to make money to support them both in Los Angeles.

name: Kabul Express
summary_text: A thrilling story spanning 48 hours of five individuals linked by hate and fear but brought together by fate to finally recognize each other.

name: All Over Me
summary_text: Claude and Ellen are best friends who live in a not-so-nice area of New York. They're involved in the subculture of 90s youth, complete with drugs, live music, and homophobia. All is ...                See full summary »

name: Hellbound
summary_text: Two Chicago cops (Chuck Norris, Calvin Levels) investigate a murder until they encounter an ancient demon.

name: Yanks
summary_text: Joining WWII, USA ships soldiers to UK. Matt and John arrive in 1942. Each see a local woman - married or to be engaged with soldiers serving faraway.

name: Wild Mountain Thyme
summary_text: A pair of star-crossed lovers in Ireland get caught up in their family's land dispute.

name: Vernon, Florida
summary_text: A documentary on the eccentric residents of Vernon, Florida.

name: Miss Fisher & the Crypt of Tears
summary_text: After freeing a young girl from her unjust imprisonment in Jerusalem, Phryne Fisher begins to unravel a mystery concerning priceless emeralds, ancient curses and the truth behind the suspicious disappearance of Shirin's forgotten tribe.

name: Us and Them
summary_text: During the hectic chunyun period, 2 strangers traveling home meet on the train.

name: Jopog manura
summary_text: The story of how Eun-jin (Eun-kyung Shin) became a legend in the South Korean underworld by defeating an army of gangsters.

name: La carrière de Suzanne
summary_text: The friendship of Bertrand and Guillaume is complicated when the womanizing Guillaume begins to pursue a charming girl named Suzanne.

name: Three Coins in the Fountain
summary_text: Three American women working in Rome, Italy, share a spacious apartment and the desire to find love and marriage, each experiencing a few bumps in their journeys to romance.

name: The Dead Room
summary_text: When a terrified family flees a desolate southern New Zealand farmhouse, two cynical scientists and a young psychic are sent to investigate their claims of a haunting. There they encounter ...                See full summary »

name: Yaariyan
summary_text: A college student must win an inter college competition to save his college from being demolished by property builders.

name: Killer Bean Forever
summary_text: Killer Bean is sent on a mission in Beantown, but when he attacks one of the warehouses owned by the mafia boss, Cappuccino, he gets the attention of Detective Cromwell, a bean who's trying to put Cappuccino, and possibly Killer Bean, behind bars.

name: ABBA: The Movie
summary_text: An incompetent radio DJ tries to get an interview with the Swedish pop group during their famous week-long 1977 tour of Australia.

name: Outlaws and Angels
summary_text: When outlaws on the lam invade the home of an unsuspecting, seemingly innocent, frontier family to hide out for the night, an unexpected game of cat and mouse ensues, leading to seduction, role reversal, and ultimately, bloody revenge.

name: One Way
summary_text: To cover up his infidelities and protect his upcoming marriage, a star advertiser helps free an accused rapist by giving a false alibi and suffers the brutal revenge of the victim.

name: Antiporno
summary_text: Japan's oldest major movie studio asks a batch of venerable filmmakers to revive its high-brow soft-core Roman Porno series.

name: All Day and a Night
summary_text: A young man who committed a homicide deals with the repercussions of his action.

name: Üvegtigris 3.
summary_text: Roadside buffet runner Lali grabs the opportunity to leave everything behind and heads to the big city in a fine sports car with a gorgeous young lady.

name: Little Secrets
summary_text: A fourteen-year-old aspiring violinist finds herself under an increasing amount of pressure to keep secrets for herself, her family and her newfound best friend.

name: Moszkva tér

summary_text: Three determined women, Divine, Cookie and Mink Stole, set out to solve the Sharon Tate murders.

name: Houdini
summary_text: From his beginnings as a "wildman" carnival act to the internationally famous feat of escaping from a locked trunk in an ice-jammed river, the great Harry Houdini emerged as the world's most captivating magician and escape artist.

name: I'm No Angel
summary_text: Circus performer Tira seeks a better life pursuing the company of wealthy New York men with improbable comic complications along the way.

name: The Teacher
summary_text: The arrival of Maria Drazdechova, associated with the Communist party, to a school in Bratislava in 1983 worries parents, students and colleagues.

name: War Pigs
summary_text: A rag tag unit of misfits known as the War Pigs must go behind enemy lines to exterminate Nazis by any means necessary.

name: Bumer: Film vtoroy
summary_text: The film takes place a few years after the events shown in Bumer (2003). Kostyan "Kot", who lost all his friends, the woman he loved and was nearly killed in the first installment of the ...                See full summary »

name: The Game of Their Lives
summary_text: Based on a true story, this film tells the tale of the 1950 U.S. soccer team, who, against all odds, beat England 1 - 0 in the city of Belo Horizonte, Brazil. Although no U.S. team has ever won a World Cup title, this story is about the family traditions and passions which shaped the lives of the players who made up this team of underdogs.

name: Chinese Box
summary_text: The story of Hong Kong, from New Year's Day to June 30th, 1997, when the British left their colony and turned it over to the People's Republic of China.

name: Abbott and Costello Go to Mars
summary_text: Two workmen accidentally launch a space rocket intended for Mars, and find mistakenly landing in New Orleans just the beginning of their misadventures.

name: Boot Hill
summary_text: Victims of oppressive town boss Honey are offered help by an unusual alliance of gunmen and circus performers.

name: Kid Galahad
summary_text: Fight promoter Nick Donati grooms a bellhop as a future champ, but has second thoughts when the 'kid' falls for his sister.

name: Mr Perfect
summary_text: Vicky breaks his engagement with Priya, his childhood friend, after he learns that she is making many compromises for his sake. But circumstances make him realise the need for compromises in life.

name: Starting Out in the Evening
summary_text: An ambitious graduate student convinces a writer that her thesis can resurrect his career.

name: Dirty Deeds
summary_text: 1973 Sydney: An Australian gangster sees booming business, due to U.S. soldiers being in town for relaxing between their tours to the Vietnam war, attracts the attention of first the Chicago mafia, and then their East Coast competitors.

summary_text: In London in 1958, a young photographer seeks media stardom to keep the love of a beautiful, aspiring fashion designer.

name: Man of Iron
summary_text: A few years after the events of Czlowiek z marmuru (1977), a journalist investigates Mateusz Birkut's son Maciek Tomczyk, now an activist leading a shipyard strike.

name: The Last Hurrah
summary_text: Frank Skeffington is an old Irish-American political boss, running for re-election as mayor of a U.S. town for the last time.

name: Children of the Corn: Genesis
summary_text: A young couple try to free an imprisoned child with catastrophic results.

name: Free Enterprise
summary_text: Two less than successful film producers, approaching mid-life crisis and clinging to their nerdy sci-fi obsessions, suddenly meet their idol: William Shatner.

name: The Mole People
summary_text: A party of archaeologists discovers the remnants of a mutant five-millennia-old Sumerian civilization living beneath a glacier atop a mountain in Mesopotamia.

name: The Sheik
summary_text: A charming Arabian sheik becomes infatuated with an adventurous, modern-thinking Englishwoman and abducts her to his home in the Saharan desert.

name: And Starring Pancho Villa as Himself
summary_text: Hollywood makes a deal with Mexican revolutionary Pancho Villa to film his war and recreate his life.

name: Greetings
summary_text: 3 friends in NYC discuss how to dodge the draft and Vietnam, JFK assassination, voyeurism, computer dating etc.

name: Paradox
summary_text: A time machine's tested first time by a man in the team traveling 1 hour into the future. He returns to warn them against killings in the next hour. Is it possible to change things in the "past"? Twist after twist follow.

name: Under the Cherry Moon
summary_text: Two con artist brothers attempt to swindle a soon-to-be wealthy heiress, but things get complicated when one falls in love with her.

name: Teenagers from Outer Space
summary_text: A young alien and a teenage earthling fall in love, and plot to stop the alien's race from using Earth as a food-breeding ground for giant lobsters from their planet.

name: Sekai no chûshin de, ai o sakebu
summary_text: While searching for his fiancee Ritsuko, Sakutarou rediscovers through flashbacks the void deep within him caused by the events from his high school days.

name: La casa con la scala nel buio
summary_text: A killer stalks a composer staying at a posh Tuscany villa while writing the score to a horror film which has an incriminating clue to the killer's identity.

name: The Visitor
summary_text: The soul of a young girl with telekinetic powers becomes the prize in a fight between forces of God and the Devil.

name: On a Clear Day
summary_text: Frank determines to salvage his self-esteem and tackle his demons by attempting the ultimate test of endurance - swimming the English Channel.

name: Made in Heaven
summary_text: After being dumped by his girlfriend, a boy runs away to California. But he ends up in heaven because he dies after trying to help a family from drowning in a river. In heaven he'll meet a beautiful girl, who has never reincarnated before.

name: Atlas Shrugged: Who Is John Galt?
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic America, the iron fist of the totalitarian government seeks to crush one mysterious man named John Galt, who has the power and influence to change everything..

name: Dirty Movie
summary_text: An outrageous cut-rate producer, Charlie LaRue is about to fulfill his lifelong dream to make a movie about the most offensive, dirtiest jokes ever told.

name: Tulpan

name: American Heart
summary_text: An ex-convict is tracked down by his estranged teenage son, and the pair try to build a relationship and life together in Seattle.

name: The Oblong Box
summary_text: Aristocrat Julian Markham keeps his disfigured brother, Sir Edward, locked in a tower of his house. Sir Edward occasionally escapes and causes havoc around the town.

name: Coven
summary_text: Basque Country, 1609. The men of the region are at sea and Amaia takes part for the first time in the nightly dances in the woods with the other villager girls. She is only 20. At dawn, they are all arrested.

summary_text: Pugazh, a police officer, wants to avenge the death of his father. He kills the four notorious criminals who were responsible for this heinous crime.

summary_text: During the 1920s, French Foreign Legion Major William Foster's (Gene Hackman's) unit is protecting an archaeological dig, but the discovery of an Arab sacred burial site prompts the angry Arab tribes to attack Foster's small garrison.

name: Hysterical Blindness
summary_text: Two friends lament their unhappy single lives while searching for Mr. Right in 1980s New Jersey.

name: Whistle Down the Wind
summary_text: When an injured wife murderer takes refuge on a remote Lancashire farm, the owner's three children mistakenly believe him to be the Second Coming of Christ.

name: Road to Rio
summary_text: Two inept vaudevillians stow away on a Brazilian-bound ocean liner and foil a plot by a sinister hypnotist to marry off her niece to a greedy fortune hunter.

name: Tarzan Escapes
summary_text: An expedition seeking to bring Jane back to civilization, and Tarzan into captivity, gets more than it's bargained for.

name: Scare Campaign
summary_text: A group of people run a TV show where they set up locations to scare people. Things go horribly wrong when the producer wants them to get darker as they set up an asylum to spook the new target: a creepy guy who used to work there.

name: The Presence
summary_text: A woman travels to an isolated cabin she begins to think she is losing her mind when her boyfriend comes to stay.

name: Dayereh-e zangi
summary_text: Mohammad is sent to an apartment situated in uptown Tehran to install their satellite dishes, while having satellite TV is illegal in Iran. He arrives there with a girl named Shirin who ...                See full summary »

summary_text: Contract killer John Alexander (Steven Seagal, "Under Siege") has a chance to save an innocent girl from a powerful mob boss, but protecting her means betraying the government agency that hired him and putting his own life at risk.

name: How to Be a Man
summary_text: When former comedian Mark McCarthy is faced with a rare form of cancer, he hires a young, impressionable cameraman to document his crude and comical lessons on what it means to be a man for his unborn son.

name: Assassin's Bullet
summary_text: A woman is killing off int'l bad guys (and witnesses). An ex FBI new man at the American Embassy in Sofia, Bulgaria, is put in charge of investigating the vigilante's actions there.

name: The Gamers: Dorkness Rising

name: Damini

name: Saedeu mubi
summary_text: Several couples struggle with their relationships

summary_text: When an escape room attraction turns from a fun bonding activity to a dangerous paranormal experience, a father and daughter must flee from an angry spirit.

summary_text: Hired to steal a rare painting from one of the most enigmatic painters of all time, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

summary_text: A young man abandons his family for a solitary life of fly-fishing. His goal was to find his own way in the fishing world and thereby find himself and love.

name: Nishabdham
summary_text: Seattle PD is investigating the murder of a man and Sakshi, a deaf and mute artist, and her husband Antony, a renowned cello player, are related to it. The findings of the investigation forms the crux of the story of Nishabdham/Silence.

name: Shijie
summary_text: An exploration on the impact of urbanization and globalization on a traditional culture.

name: 28 Hotel Rooms
summary_text: A novelist and an accountant meet while they are traveling for work, and though they both are in relationships, their one-night stand could become something more.

summary_text: Suspecting that his childhood friend, a professional boxer, is having a love affair with his fiancée, a businessman starts training rigorously in order to take him down.

summary_text: Gwyn begins doubting her "yes" to Matt's wedding proposal, when she hears about her parents' and brother's adultery.

summary_text: A daughter of the powerful Duke must show her courage and inventiveness to be with the man she loves.

summary_text: Martin and Hazel Quarrier are small-town fundamentalist missionaries sent to the jungles of South America to convert the Indians. Their remote mission was previously run by the Catholics, ...                See full summary »

summary_text: Cheech and Chong are hired to drive a limo from Chicago to Las Vegas by two shady Arabs - Mr. Slyman (Cheech) and Prince Habib (Chong). Unbeknownst to them, five million dollars of dirty money has been stuffed throughout the car.

summary_text: A suddenly-unemployed company executive suffers a nervous breakdown, and his supporting wife tries everything to console him and pick up the slack.

summary_text: A British East India Trading Company assassin seeks to redeem his past by thwarting a plot against a young nation's hope for freedom.

summary_text: A family man's encounter with a beautiful woman develops into a mutual fascination.

name: Piter FM
summary_text: Lyrical story about two young people, Masha and Maksim, who have to decide what to do.

summary_text: An American assassin, who works for cartels in Latin America, is back in USA. He gets a woman before each job and kills her after. FBI's on to him but are curious about his next big job.

summary_text: Biopic of transgender Muay Thai boxer Parinya Charoenphol who pursued the sport to pay for her gender reassignment surgery.

name: Dung fong sam hap

name: Inseminoid
summary_text: A crew of interplanetary archaeologists is threatened when an alien creature impregnates one of their members, causing her to turn homicidal and murder them one by one.

name: My Favorite Brunette
summary_text: Shortly before his execution on the death row in San Quentin, amateur sleuth and baby photographer Ronnie Jackson, tells reporters how he got there.

summary_text: Timmy turns 23 and his godparents are fighting to keep him, while Crocker is still up to his nefarious schemes.

summary_text: The result of the small handkerchiefs "Petits mouchoirs", 7 years later. The band, which erupted, is found on the occasion of the anniversary surprise organized for Max.

name: The Tarnished Angels
summary_text: Story of a friendship between an eccentric journalist and a daredevil barnstorming pilot.

name: Maara
summary_text: When Paaru sees a fairy tale she heard from a stranger as a child painted across the walls of a coastal town, she goes in search of the man who painted it-Maara.

summary_text: Patti Petalson (Blair) struggles with the pressure of becoming the next important American writer.

name: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
summary_text: An extended family split up in France and Germany find themselves on opposing sides of the battlefield during World War I.

name: Someone, Somewhere
summary_text: Rémy, a young Parisian with an unskilled job. Mélanie, a young she-Parisian who works in scientific research. Two depressive moods living in close proximity but strange to each other. Shall the two ever meet?

summary_text: Hornblower is given a dangerous mission to deliver an emigre French nobleman to a secret rendezvous near Brest while coping with enemy agents in his own ranks.

summary_text: Middle-aged Gerald Kingsland advertises in a London paper for a female companion to spend a year with him on a desert island.

summary_text: A paleontologist and her husband discover a mother and baby brontosaurus in Africa, and try to protect them from a group of hunters intent on capturing the dinosaurs.

name: Putney Swope
summary_text: The board of directors at a Madison Avenue ad agency must elect a new chairman. In the maneuvering to make sure that enemies don't get votes, all the members accidentally cast their ballot for the board's token black man, Putney Swope.

name: The Final Wish
summary_text: After the death of his father, Aaron returns home to help his grief-stricken mother and to confront his past. Going through his dad's belongings, he comes across a mysterious item that is more than it seems.

name: Critical Condition
summary_text: Con man Kevin Lennihan, framed in a jewel smuggling, tries for an insanity plea, and is sent to a hospital for review, where he is confused for a doctor and takes over the hospital when a major storm hits.

name: Wisdom
summary_text: Unable to find work after a past felony, graduate John Wisdom and his girlfriend embark on a cross-country bank-robbing spree in order to aid American farmers.

name: The Screaming Skull
summary_text: A newly married couple arrives at the home of the husband's late wife, where the gardens have been maintained by a gardener faithful to the dead woman's memory. Soon, eerie events lead the new wife to think she's losing her mind.

name: The Italian
summary_text: Set in 2002, an abandoned 5-year-old boy living in a rundown orphanage in a small Russian village is adopted by an Italian family.

name: Bloody Mama
summary_text: A psychologically-disturbed matriarch presides over her damaged family of bank-robbing misfits.

name: Bay of Angels
summary_text: Jean is a clerk in a bank. His colleague Caron is a gambler and gives him the virus. In the casinos, Jean meets Jackie. Their love affair will follow their luck at the roulette.

name: How to Build a Girl
summary_text: A teenager living with her working-class family on a council estate in Wolverhampton, England, grows up to become a popular but conflicted music journalist.

name: The Killing Floor
summary_text: A literary agent moves into a penthouse apartment. Soon after the move, he receives crime scene photographs that seem to have taken place in his new apartment. Next he receives a series of stalker videotapes that document his every move.

name: Baabul
summary_text: When his only son dies in an accident, Balraaj urges his depressed daughter-in-law to marry a man who has long loved her in silence.

name: Fist of the North Star
summary_text: Based on a graphic novel, this apocalyptic adventure centers on a man who must reverse the cataclysmic conditions of his world.

name: Neokonchennaya pyesa dlya mekhanicheskogo pianino
summary_text: Early in the 20th century, family and friends gather at the country estate of a general's widow, Anna Petrovna. Sofia, the new wife of Anna's step-son, recognizes Misha, the brother-in-law ...                See full summary »

name: Island in the Sky
summary_text: A C-47 transport plane, named the Corsair, makes a forced landing in the frozen wastes of Quebec, and the plane's pilot, Captain Dooley, must keep his men alive in deadly conditions while waiting for rescue.

name: Easy Living
summary_text: A wealthy banker throws his wife's expensive fur coat off the roof of a building; it lands on the head of a stenographer, leading to everyone assuming she is his mistress and has access to his millions.

name: The Mask of Fu Manchu
summary_text: Englishmen race to find the tomb of Genghis Khan before the sinister Fu Manchu does.

name: Underworld U.S.A.
summary_text: A teenager who witnesses the murder of his father vows to exact revenge on the four mobsters involved in the killing.

name: Zozo
summary_text: A Lebanese boy gets separated from his family during the civil war and ends up in Sweden.

name: XX/XY
summary_text: Three friends begin a dangerous three-way relationship that spirals out of control, leading to dire consequences that haunt them ten years later.

name: Under the Sun of Satan
summary_text: A priest stuck in a rural congregation and burdened with his overwrought spirituality, finds purpose in a troubled woman accused of murder.

name: Three Outlaw Samurai
summary_text: When poor peasants kidnap a magistrate's daughter to coerce him into reducing their unfair taxes, a wandering ronin decides to give them some help.

name: Seduced and Abandoned
summary_text: A desperate Sicilian man, whose 15-year-old daughter was seduced and impregnated by his older daughter's fiancé, tries to find a way to save the family's honor.

name: It's Always Fair Weather
summary_text: Three soldiers meet ten years after their last meeting in New York, and find out that they have little in common now.

name: Red Shoes and the Seven Dwarfs
summary_text: Princes who have been turned into Dwarfs seek the red shoes of a lady in order to break the spell, although it will not be easy. A parody with a twist.

name: Raid on Entebbe
summary_text: True story of a daring Israeli commando assault on the Entebbe Airport in Uganda to free hostages of a terrorist hijacking.

name: The President's Analyst
summary_text: When the overworked and stressed-out White House presidential shrink runs away, the CEA and the FBR scramble to retrieve him before he could be abducted by various competing foreign intelligence services.

name: Bloody Hell
summary_text: A man with a mysterious past flees the country to escape his own personal hell - only to arrive somewhere much, much worse.

name: Satte Pe Satta
summary_text: The eldest of seven brothers, who run a family farm together, marries a pretty nurse, inspiring his country-bumpkin siblings to follow his example.

name: Murder by Contract
summary_text: Claude is a ruthless and efficient contract killer - until he finds his next target is a woman.

name: Mektoub, My Love: Canto Uno
summary_text: A teen boy comes back to his hometown during summer vacation in search for love (in 1994).

name: Sivas
summary_text: An eleven-year-old boy and a weathered fighting dog develop a strong relationship after the boy finds the dog wounded in a ditch, left to die.

name: One Missed Call 2
summary_text: A Japanese restaurant cook/owner dies after answering his daughter's cellphone. Other people are getting strange, same ringtone calls as well and dying painfully. It happened in Taiwan as well. Can the police stop it if it's a ghost?

name: Das Schloß
summary_text: When a land surveyor arrives at a small snowy village, local authorities refuse to allow him to advance to the nearby castle. Increasingly complicated bureaucratic obstacles arise.

name: Arme Riddere
summary_text: Terrified and bloody, Oscar Svendsen awakes clinched to a shotgun in a strippers joint. Around him 8 dead men, and police aiming at him. To Oscar it's clear that he is innocent. It all started when four chaps won 1,7 million on the pools...

name: The Lovers
summary_text: An epic, sweeping and riveting tale of an impossible love set across two time periods and continents.

name: Brendan Schaub: You'd Be Surprised
summary_text: A modern-day renaissance man, Schaub is a failed footballer, failed MMA fighter and current podcast host. Now, he adds another achievement to his resume. He takes to the stage to tell his tales in his first-ever stand-up comedy special.

name: Amar Bondhu Rashed
summary_text: Amar Bondhu Rashed, a fictional story based on the Liberation War of Bangladesh and written by the popular children's literature Dr Mohammad Jafar Iqbal

name: Splendor
summary_text: Veronica, 22, meets a writer and a drummer hunk at a club on Halloween. Why choose when she can have both? 3some? But then a third man comes along.

name: Khashm Va Hayahoo
summary_text: Khosrow is a famous married singer involved with a troublesome affair and consequences of fame.

name: The Remains
summary_text: When a family moves into an old Victorian home, they discover a chest in the attic containing antiques inhabited by an evil spirit. As the antiques slowly possess each family member, the spirit grows stronger.

name: Let It Shine
summary_text: A teenage rapper must use his musical talent to battle his nemesis and win the girl of his dreams.

name: 17 filles
summary_text: When a rebellious teenager finds out that she is already eight weeks pregnant, she forms a pact with sixteen of her classmates to get pregnant simultaneously, raise their children together, and most of all, be in charge of their lives.

name: Idiots and Angels
summary_text: Much to his surprise, an utter misanthrope is transformed into a reluctant do-gooder, when a glorious pair of angelic snow-white wings sprouts up from his back. Now, everyone in town wants a piece of his feathered appendages.

name: Hail Mary
summary_text: A college student gets pregnant without having intercourse, affecting people close and unrelated to her in different ways.

name: Marlowe
summary_text: A young woman from Kansas hires LA private detective Philip Marlowe to find her missing brother.

name: Rachel, Rachel
summary_text: Rachel is a lonely school teacher who lives with her mother. When a man from the big city asks her out, she starts thinking about where she wants her life to go.

name: House of Bamboo
summary_text: Planted in a Tokyo crime syndicate, a U.S. Army Investigator attempts to probe the coinciding death of a fellow Army official.

name: House by the River
summary_text: A deranged writer murders a maid after she resists his advances. The writer engages his brother's help in hiding the body, causing unexpected problems for both of them.

name: Hadi Be Oglum
summary_text: Ali, a fisherman, devoted his life to his young son, Efe. Efe was the only son of Ali who was in this life. Efe is different from other children. Efe, who has a communication problem, is ...                See full summary »

name: Frosty Returns
summary_text: The continuing exploits of the famous snowman as he goes up against a more powerful force which threatens all of Christmas.

name: Summer's Moon
summary_text: A family of serial killers stalk a young woman out to find the father she's never known.

name: Polish Wedding
summary_text: The film centers on a big Polish family. Jadzia is the mother and the ruler of the Pzoniak family (she has five children). Though she's happily married to Bolek, she is also having a ...                See full summary »

name: The Lost Patrol
summary_text: A dozen British soldiers, lost in a Mesopotamian desert during World War I, are menaced by unseen Arab enemies.

name: Kings
summary_text: The life of a foster family in South Central Los Angeles, a few weeks before the city erupts in violence following the verdict of the Rodney King trial.

name: Dead Awake
summary_text: A young woman must save herself and her friends from an ancient evil that stalks its victims through the real-life phenomenon of sleep paralysis.

name: Gekijô-ban Naruto Shippûden: Hi no ishi wo tsugu mono
summary_text: Ninjas with bloodline limits begin disappearing in all the countries and blame points toward the fire nation. By Tsunade's order, Kakashi is sacrificed to prevent an all out war. Naruto fights through friends and foes to prevent his death.

name: Jimmy Hollywood
summary_text: A failing actor living in crime infested Los Angeles, frustrated with his career, decides to take the law into his own hands, and becomes the leader of a mock-vigilante group that videotapes criminals and turns them over to the police.

name: Knock on Any Door
summary_text: An attorney defends a hoodlum of murder, using the oppressiveness of the slums to appeal to the court.

name: Woman in the Moon
summary_text: A tenacious scientist blasts off for the moon in hopes of riches that may be found there.

name: Batman: Soul of the Dragon
summary_text: In the 1970s, a missing teacher of martial arts is the subject of a quest by his devoted and brilliant but distant students, who include Batman.

name: Eichmann
summary_text: Based upon the final confession of Adolf Eichmann, made before his execution in Israel as he accounts to Captain Avner Less, a young Israeli police officer, of his past as the architect of ...                See full summary »

name: O Fantasma
summary_text: Young and handsome Sergio works the night shift as a trash collector in Lisbon, Portugal. He can't force himself to connect with his pretty female co-worker Fatima, who displays an avid ...                See full summary »

name: Luna Papa
summary_text: The unborn child of Mamlakat (Khamatova) is telling her story. She is 17, beautiful and vivacious, and dreaming secretly of becoming an actress. She lives with her father and brother (...                See full summary »

name: The Inspector General
summary_text: A town's corrupt officials think a fool is actually an investigator in disguise.

name: Tarzan's New York Adventure
summary_text: Tarzan and Jane go to New York to rescue Boy after he is kidnapped into a circus.

name: Come Out and Play
summary_text: A couple take a vacation to a remote island - their last holiday together before they become parents. Soon after their arrival, they notice that no adults seem to be present - an observation that quickly presents a nightmarish reality.

name: Static
summary_text: A couple facing marital problems after losing their child finds their life together further complicated by a mysterious visitor.

name: Loverboy
summary_text: A neglected daughter becomes a possessive mother in an emotional journey into the heart and mind of a woman who loved too much.

name: The Initiation
summary_text: An amnesiac sorority member who has been plagued by a recurring nightmare is stalked alongside other coeds by a killer in a deserted department store where they are completing a hazing ritual.

name: The Big Bus
summary_text: A nuclear powered bus driving cross-country, from New York City to Colorado, is destined for disaster due to the machinations of a mysterious group allied with the oil lobby.

name: Antibirth
summary_text: In a desolate community full of drug-addled Marines and rumors of kidnapping, a wild-eyed stoner named Lou wakes up after a wild night of partying with symptoms of a strange illness and ...                See full summary »

name: Jesse Stone: No Remorse
summary_text: Police Chief Jesse Stone's suspended in Paradise. He helps a friend as "temp" with a serial killer in Boston. He gets his first cellphone to avoid calls from his ex. Paradise PD's way over its head with a convenience store robbery/murder.

name: Benvenuto Presidente!
summary_text: A Mr. No One is mistakenly elected President of the Italian Republic.

name: Combustión
summary_text: Ari works with her boyfriend and another criminal, where she seduces rich men and the 2 men rob them. She seduces Mikel. Her partners aren't happy until he joins them in illegal car racing. And Mikel's rich fiancee...?

name: Tala va mes
summary_text: A Tehran mullah-in-training struggles to take care of his ailing wife and their children in this profoundly moving melodrama. A film of near-universal appeal, it puts a human face on Iran's...                See full summary »

name: Crazy Eights
summary_text: Circumstance brings six childhood friends together to face their past, and a secret they share.

name: Flaming Star
summary_text: When fighting breaks out between two cultures in West Texas, the mixed-blood Pacer tries to act as a peacemaker, but the "flaming star of death" pulls him irrevocably into the deadly violence.

name: Loosideu deurim
summary_text: Dae-ho, an investigative journalist, seeks to track down the whereabouts of his son who was abducted three years ago. With the help of a detective and a psychiatrist friend, he will retrace...                See full summary »

name: The Oscars
summary_text: Seth MacFarlane hosts the Academy Awards.

name: Sky Kids
summary_text: Two boys from a small town find their courage tested when they accidentally stow away aboard an airplane owned by the mob.

name: Man Without a Star
summary_text: A drifter working as foreman for an iron-fist female rancher must chose sides between his attractive employer and the other neighboring settlers who are mistreated by her.

name: Queen Kelly
summary_text: A convent girl is abducted and seduced by a prince before being sent off to a brothel in East Africa.

name: Perdona si te llamo amor
summary_text: A successful, attractive, intelligent and brilliant advertising executive is longing to finally find emotional stability in his life, and decides to propose to his girlfriend. After she ...                See full summary »

name: Lost in Thailand
summary_text: On a wild road trip, three men find inner peace in the city that never sleeps.

name: Duel at Diablo
summary_text: In Apache territory, a supply Army column heads for the next fort, an ex-scout searches for the killer of his Indian wife, and a housewife abandons her husband in order to rejoin her Apache lover's tribe.
